body: Yeah. Rather than the other guy's dick, she's more turned on from the thought of cheating her friend. Shuuji, the guy, actually commented how Amane didn't get wet. Normally, she would have been happy because she's no longer cheating her best friend, but knowing Saki is breaking up with him actually made her feel not enough, so he wants to stop having sex with Amane too. They tried calling Saki to join them (and the thought really turns Amane on), but Saki doesn't want it anymore and move out. Shuuji also break all contact, so Amane need a new place to get her pleasure. | Saki's parents divorced so she got bullied, and in middle school she look for a guy to help her get over the loneliness. She got addicted to the sex, but with Amane wanting to be her friend, she actually thought of breaking up with her boyfriend (who only treat her as sex friend anyway).
damn, she rly got addicted to ntr-ing her friends
